title: EventGather
shortDescription: A modern web platform for event management and collaboration.
description: EventGather is a full-featured event management platform that enables users to create, manage, and share events effortlessly. The design emphasizes clarity and usability, with a focus on seamless navigation and engaging visuals.

title: Freezmix Morocco
shortDescription: Brand identity and packaging for a Moroccan frozen dessert brand.
description: Freezmix Morocco is a visual branding project centered around fresh colors and minimal layouts. The identity reflects the vibrant, refreshing nature of the brand, blending modern design principles with Moroccan flair.

title: BloomBar Brussels
shortDescription: A visual identity and web design for a floral-inspired cocktail bar.
description: BloomBar Brussels combines organic shapes and soft colors to create a unique visual experience. The branding captures the essence of nature and nightlife, offering a bold yet elegant aesthetic.

title: Chandelle Botanique
shortDescription: E-commerce website for a sustainable candle brand.
description: Chandelle Botanique is a minimalist e-commerce platform designed for a handmade candle brand. The layout prioritizes clean visuals and natural tones, creating an immersive and calm shopping experience.

title: Beauty Slim
shortDescription: Website redesign for a premium beauty and wellness center.
description: Beauty Slim focuses on an elegant and feminine aesthetic, with a smooth UX to highlight the brand’s premium wellness services. The design blends soft gradients and modern typography for a refined digital presence.

title: Nayehza
shortDescription: A sleek business website for a digital consultancy.
description: Nayehza is a digital-first website designed for a tech consultancy. The UI emphasizes clarity, motion, and trust, using a structured layout to highlight services and client impact.

title: Murcia Trading
shortDescription: Corporate branding and web platform for an international trading firm.
description: Murcia Trading’s web platform features a professional and minimal design focused on clarity and performance. The interface balances corporate identity with an approachable design language.

title: Boutique Maschio
shortDescription: Luxury fashion e-commerce concept for a boutique brand.
description: Boutique Maschio offers a refined e-commerce experience for a men’s luxury brand. The interface combines dark elegance and refined product presentation, elevating the brand’s digital presence.

title: Murcia Renovo
shortDescription: Website concept for a construction and renovation company.
description: Murcia Renovo features a bold and clean design tailored for the renovation industry. The website highlights craftsmanship, trust, and expertise through structured sections and strong visual hierarchy.

title: MileStone
shortDescription: A project management dashboard built from scratch with custom UI.
description: MileStone is a full-stack web application designed to manage teams, projects, and milestones efficiently. It integrates a responsive dashboard, authentication system, and visual analytics.

title: Magic The Gathering
shortDescription: Fan platform and card database for Magic: The Gathering players.
description: This full-stack web app provides an intuitive experience for MTG fans to browse, search, and organize cards. The interface balances vivid design with fast performance and interactivity.

title: League Of Legends App
shortDescription: A mobile stats tracker app for League of Legends players.
description: This mobile app provides detailed player statistics and match analytics for League of Legends. The design prioritizes clarity, dark mode aesthetics, and game-inspired visuals.

title: Bring Em GmbH
shortDescription: Corporate platform for a German SaaS and logistics company.
description: Bring Em GmbH is a professional web platform featuring a clean, modular UI and optimized structure for scalability. The design combines modern corporate style with strong usability and performance.
